mean_cn: n. 录像，录音；  adj. 记录的，记录用的
mean_en: music, sounds, or images that have been stored on a record, CD, computer, etc., so that they can be heard or seen again
word_etyma: re再+cord心脏+ing表名词→记录，录音
sentence: We can transfer your old sound recording onto a CD so you can listen to it at home.
sentence_trans: 我们能把你老唱片上的音乐转存到CD光盘上，以便你在家也能听。
